channel.title: Series on Incredible Technology, Incredibly Simple
channel.description: Recent content in Series on Incredible Technology, Incredibly Simple

item.title: Azure IoT Operations
item.description: In this series, we will explore Azure and Infrastructure as Code (IaC), focusing on how to automate and manage cloud infrastructure using code. By leveraging IaC practices, developers can enhance deployment efficiency, ensure consistency, and streamline operations. Join us as we delve into tools, techniques, and best practices for effective cloud infrastructure management.

item.title: Developer Platform
item.description: Everything about the Azure Developer Platform.
